items.title: BMW M3 GTR GT, E46
items.summary: BMW M Motorsport built this 2001 M3 GTR for the American Le Mans Series (ALMS), where it became a dominant GT-class race car. It won 7 of 10 races, and later became a cult icon through Need for Speed: Most Wanted (2005).

items.title: New EV policy announced: incentives expanded for local manufacturing
items.summary: Government incentives for EV manufacturing are expected to support local production, supply chains, and battery ecosystem growth.

items.title: Tata Nexon EV gets a new long-range variant (rumoured)

items.title: Toyota teases next-gen Fortuner: what to expect
items.summary: Toyota has teased the next-generation Fortuner, with expected updates in design, features, and powertrain options.

items.title: Hyundai launches new safety tech package across top trims
items.summary: Hyundai is adding an upgraded safety technology pack across higher variants, expanding advanced driver-assistance features.

items.title: F1: Driver wins season opener after late safety car drama
items.summary: A dramatic late safety car reshuffled the race before the winner sealed victory in the season-opening Formula 1 event.
